content.text: I'm a creative person who enjoys using my imagination to create new things. I love photography!
That's awesome! What is your favorite thing to photograph?
I love to take photos of my garden, my daughters, and my artwork.
That's so cool! I love gardening too. I do n't have daughters but I have a girlfriend. I'm heading home after a long run to see her and eat some tacos.
That sounds like a perfect way to end a long day! I love tacos!
Do you have any plans for the weekend?
Not really, just hanging out with my family and relaxing.
Sounds like a good way to spend the weekend! I'm heading to a horror movie marathon with my friends.
Oh that sounds fun! I love horror movies!
My grandpa was in WWII, so I've always been a big fan of war movies and documentaries.
That's awesome! My grandpa was also in WWII. He fought in the Battle of the Bulge.
Wow, that's amazing! I bet he has some great stories to tell.
He does! He's told me a lot of them over the years.
I'd love to hear some of them sometime
